tasks.label: Auto-fix (ruff+isort+black)
tasks.command: & "${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" -m pip install -q ruff black isort; & "${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" -m ruff check --fix .; & "${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" -m isort .; & "${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" -m black .; & "${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" tools/apply_prioritized_fixes.py
